definition: to rule/to govern/to manage/to control/to harness (a river)/to treat (a disease)/to wipe out (a pest)/to punish/to research

sentences.english: You can zoom in now and get a pretty nice view of the Dome.
sentences.chinese: 我們可以隨意放大來好好觀賞一下佐治亞穹頂的風光。

sentences.english: I'll never forget my last visit to lovely Hinesville, Georgia.
sentences.chinese: 我永遠不會忘記到美麗的佐治亞州海恩斯維爾的旅途。

sentences.english: In central Georgia, sweetgum and poplar trees grow in large numbers.
sentences.chinese: 在佐治亞州中部，生長有大量的楓香樹和白楊樹。

sentences.english: He was visiting professor of geology at the University of Georgia.
sentences.chinese: 他曾是佐治亞大學的地質學客座教授。

sentences.english: The work will be performed in Albany, Ga. The Marine Corps Systems Command is the contracting activity.
sentences.chinese: 這項工作將在佐治亞州奧爾巴尼進行。

sentences.english: The burial took place at the Magnolia Cemetery in Augusta, Georgia.
sentences.chinese: 葬禮在佐治亞州奧古斯塔的木蘭墓地舉行。

sentences.english: I saw a crape myrtle that’s supposed to be the oldest tree in the state.
sentences.chinese: 我看見一棵紫薇樹，應該是佐治亞州最老的樹了。

sentences.english: This is the Georgia Guidestones scenario - to reduce the world's population.
sentences.chinese: 這是佐治亞州石碑的版本，來減少世界人口。

sentences.english: So what’s the matter with Georgia?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，佐治亞是怎麼回事？
